name: Potato King
description:
Protect The Potato King - Shoot feces at the slugs before they reach the King
controls AD = Left & Right
Right Click = Jump
Left Click = Shoot

Created by David McDonald (my first game jam, yew!)
https://twitter.com/Davidmcdonald89

Made for LD48 number 32.

This game was created in 48 hours.

Note to self: leave more time for (Score UI, Sounds, Menu, Balancing)
